name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings - Great Adventures in New Worlds Vol. 1
summary: This bundle will add two new areas to the game: a Nights of Azure 2 tribute area "Nightless Ruined City" and the "Lotus Blossom Pond" area. *This content unlocks after the final chapter of the game. *This content is also included into "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."
